TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Point3D extends System.ValueType implements class System.IFormattable

summary.span: 表示三维空间中的 x、y 和 z 坐标点。

span.span: Represents an x-, y-, and z-coordinate point in 3-D space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 XAML 中的值之间的分隔符可以是逗号或空格。In XAML, the delimiter between the values of a can be either a comma or a space. 某些区域性可能会使用逗号字符作为小数分隔符而不是句点字符。Some cultures might use the comma character as the decimal delimiter instead of the period character. XAML 处理固定区域性为 EN-US 在大多数 XAML 处理器实现中，默认设置，并且需要要将小数分隔符的段。XAML processing for invariant culture defaults to en-US in most XAML processor implementations, and expects the period to be the decimal delimiter. 你应避免使用逗号字符作为小数分隔符，如果指定在 XAML 中，因为，将能与字符串类型转换的冲突属性值为其组件。You should avoid using the comma character as the decimal delimiter if specifying a in XAML, because that will clash with the string type conversion of a attribute value into its components. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作等效于将添加结构具有相应的结构， ，和值。This operation is equivalent to adding a structure to a structure with the corresponding , , and values. 请注意，调用方法只会造成影响，如果可以更改， ，和直接属性。Note that calling the method will only have an effect if you can change the , , and properties directly. 因为是值类型，如果引用对象使用的属性或索引，你将获得一份对象，未对对象的引用。Because is a value type, if you reference a object by using a property or indexer, you get a copy of the object, not a reference to the object. 如果你尝试更改， ，或上的属性或索引器的引用，则编译器将发生错误。If you attempt to change , , or on a property or indexer reference, a compiler error occurs. 同样，调用属性或索引器上将不会更改基础对象。Similarly, calling on the property or indexer will not change the underlying object. 如果你想要更改的值引用为属性或索引器，创建一个新修改其字段，然后将分配回属性或索引器。If you want to change the value of a that is referenced as a property or indexer, create a new , modify its fields, and then assign the back to the property or indexer. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何偏移结构。The following example shows how to offset a structure.
